title: Dragon Trainer Tristana
body:
Hey Riot we have all seen your new wonderful creation with the new dragon trainer tristana skin and believe me it is amazing, but there is only one problem. With the snowdown coming heaps of people are putting money on league to buy the skins coming out and we have now seen this skin that everyone wants. Please Riot help us out and put this skin half price or something so that people can grab this skin and a few others from snowdown. Thanks heaps riot for your creation but help out the League community and give it a discount for snowdown so that we can grab others  skins and champs!
